Type.BattleDialog: Time for this expensive procedure to prove its worth.
Certainly… It’s trickier to analyze the things here.
We shouldn’t be rash, and figure out the foe’s behavior before we move…
That felt more honest than how we usually gather intel.
Anyone got badly damaged? Check your bodies.
I didn’t mean to hold others back like this.
I got blinded by money and drove ourselves to hell. What a pathetic twit I’ve become…
I can’t stop here, we have a goal to achieve.
It’s not good to suffer losses like this.
Such attacks are only a waste of time.
You’re in my attack range.
Don’t worry about over here. I just shot down this one.
Careful. I can’t make an estimate of their power level.
Look straight ahead if you have time to complain.
Watch for the enemy’s movement.
I hope this can help us find some leads on the Singularity.
I did sustain a bit of damage… But I have no problem moving.
No… The damage is too severe. I’m at my limit…
My sight is choppy. Something might be wrong with my cam…
This is bad… More of my parts are being damaged, too.
We might suffer a serious loss.
Enemy terminated. But the battle isn’t over yet.
The enemy is in front of me. Must be swift to attack…
You’re a hindrance… Out of my way.
We really gotta rethink if this job is worth it…
You sure we can get the info the Molar Fixers had this way?
Fine, I got it… I’ll take it seriously.
I dunno how valuable these bunches of paper might be, but… Was it really worth fighting tooth and nail for…?
Can we get our two hundred million Ahn now? Not a bad result.
I just wanna get outta this hellhole!!!
Curses. Shouldn’t have come to an outrageous place like this…
You can’t spread yourself thin and then just pass away…
You’re all mad… This was a dumb idea in every way imaginable.
That was way too close… This ain’t good.
I chose the more expensive surgery for a reason.
We did take some heavy damage… How long can I hold out?
